definition: (of light rays) subjected to scattering by reflection from a rough surface or transmission through a translucent material
details:
adjective
- (of light rays) subjected to scattering by reflection from a rough surface or transmission through a translucent material
= example: (of light rays) subjected to scattering by reflection from a rough surface or transmission through a translucent material
- (of light) transmitted from a broad light source or reflected
= synonyms: soft
